revised_title: Researches on the Composition of Blue Derivatives of Tertiary Monamines from Cinchonine
tldr: The author examines the composition of blue derivatives of tertiary monamines derived from cinchonine, focusing on the iodide of a peculiar basic compound. They discuss the properties and formation of these compounds, as well as their reactions with other substances. The research contributes to the understanding of the chemical structure and behavior of these blue dyes.
